enumdef.name: lv_image_align
enumdef.help: How the image is placed inside its container

enum.name: contain
enum.help: Scale to fit inside while keeping aspect ratio

enum.name: cover
enum.help: Scale to fully cover while keeping aspect ratio

prop.name: src
prop.help: Set the image source (file, symbol, or variable)

prop.name: inner_align
prop.help: Align and scale the image inside

prop.name: pivot_x
prop.help: Set the pivot X for rotation/scaling

prop.name: pivot_y
prop.help: Set the pivot Y for rotation/scaling

prop.name: bind_src
prop.help: Bind the image source to a subject
